column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I live close to Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba and have been a handful of times. I've tried a lot of their menu items and really liked the proscuitto wrapped dates
column2: the goat cheese and tomato sauce
column3: and the croquettes. It is slightly overpriced for what you get and it adds up fast. Also
column4: they took churros off the dessert menu
column5: which should be considered a sin.
